column5: Got out a bit later today around 9ish.  Wilmot was packed, Duffins was packed, so we headed off to a "not-to-be-named" spot and we got into them.  I'm still learning this whole steelhead thing, and my hookup:landing ratio is not a nice thing to look at.  I went 2 for 11 today, one of which that I landed was a 14 inch brown.  Lost a pig, 10+ all on pink roe.  I'll post pics later on.
ya i was out yesterday and eperienced the same thing, TONS of guys!!!! good to hear you got into fish though, hooking them is the best part, landing them is a bonus.
just keep at her bro!! it'll come!!
man it's only friday and it's already packed ... i wonder what they're gonna look like during the weekend  thanks for the report!

well i bet this weekend all the creeks and rivers will be just lined   shoulder to shoulder   with people ,and there is no way i will be anywhere near that...but glad you were hooking them steve.better luck next time,you will get better just stay at it....cheers
GO TO SCHOOL..... your missin too much class.....LOL
i only had human relations today fella, not too worried about that one.
Good work.  Having just started, I'd be real proud of the 11 part rather than down on the 2-for part.  Keep at it - I'm sure the experience will continue to improve the results.
